name: skfuntips
short_description:
SkFunTips is a text post-process tool,which can produce many wonderful and fun styled text, such as to loop animationed gif, use many small chars to make up a big char(just like MATRIX!) ,and many more !
you can use this tool to generate attractive tips for blog and forum,just like following:
S |__|s |__|  |__|p |__|f 
k |__|, |__|y |__|  |__|u 
F |__|  |__|o |__|w |__|l 
u |__|m |__|u |__|o |__|! 
n |__|a |__|r |__|n |__|
T |__|k |__|  |__|d |__|
i |__|e |__|t |__|e |__|
p |__|s |__|i |__|r |__|
summary: makes your text fun and wonderful!
